page.description: Write an email profile to the registry. The EMAIL_PROFILE_SAVE() function saves an email profile to the Windows registry.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = email_profile_save(C profile ,P em )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

argument.name: profile
argument.description: The name of an email profile. See EMAIL_GET_ACTIVE().

argument.name: em
argument.description: A dot variable containing email profile settings. See EMAIL_PROFILE_LOAD().

page.example: dim p as P ? email_profile_save(email_get_active() , p) = .T.
